newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - AWB Australian wheat indicator prices -Nov 22.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - AWB Australian wheat indicator prices -Nov 22.

text.p: International prices for milling and durum wheat were weaker overnight and the Australian dollar was sharply stronger, the Australian Wheat Board (AWB) said. Wheat indicator prices for multi-grade contracts for 1996/97 crop wheat were reduced by A$2.00 a tonne (durum prices not applicable). Prices, FOB, in A$ per tonne:

NOTE: The indicator price represents the current state of the international wheat market. It is a cash contract price offered today by the AWB for wheat delivered during the 1996/97 harvest. The offer is valid until 4.30 p.m. Australian Eastern Standard Summer Time (0530 GMT).
